divs: Sighting DetailsOn Tue June 1st at 5:55 Pm We saw a Sphere In Mid-Air. Silver on Back Silver on Bottom Clear on Top with someone or something Dark In It. It was In View Lower then a Air Plain higher then the Trees (It Looked like a Jetson Air hovercar) It was going North West (No Sound). We saw It for 5 Min's then It Just disappeared. It was not a balloon , Air Plain or Bird. But It was weird
Summary: Sphere silver on back silver on bottom clear on top with someone or something dark in it.
Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Other
